item.description:
Sharing the Presence is a practice which cultivates a permanently unfolding field.  This field furthers, encourages, stimulates and supports presence, awareness and compassion in the world and cultivates an encompassing understanding of human consciousness and potential.

With our integral approach we include the development of all streams of life, seeing it with the eyes of the ever-present, timeless wisdom.

Sharing the Presence begs the questions: 

  • How can we live a life of transparency and at the same time represent total responsibility in the world?
  • Do we have the courage to go beyond our limited image of the "I"?
  • Do we have the courage to taste the freedom of creation and to emerge into timeless wisdom?

This open evening offers a talk, guided exercises in transparent communication and a toning meditation.  

About Thomas Huebl

Thomas Huebl is a contemporary spiritual teacher of uncompromising clarity whose work reveals the enlightened potential of a new form of humanity which he calls a 'we-culture', accessible to us all. Drawing from the mystcial experiences of all spiritual traditions, his international workshops, trainings and talks guide people to a deeper level of self-awareness and personal responsibility – a radical transcendence of an ego-centred world view opens the doorway to a profound life of authentic expression, service and alignment with the Absolute. Thomas lives in Germany and will be touring the United States this Spring visiting Boston, New York, Boulder, San Francisco & Vancouver BC.

Visit Thomas Huebl's website at www.sharingthepresence.com

Click here to go to Samadhi's event page and register for what's sure to be an amazing evening!
item.name: Sharing the Presence: An Integral Approach with Thomas Huebl
